statements: SELECT * FROM singing_classes;
SELECT class_id, class_date FROM singing_classes;
SELECT class_time, class_location FROM singing_classes;
SELECT class_date, class_location FROM singing_classes ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM singing_classes WHERE class_location = 'Studio A';
SELECT * FROM singing_classes WHERE class_location = 'Studio A' ORDER BY class_date DESC, class_time ASC;
SELECT class_id, class_location FROM singing_classes WHERE class_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY class_location;
SELECT class_id, class_date, class_time FROM singing_classes WHERE class_location LIKE 'Studio%' ORDER BY class_date, class_time;
SELECT * FROM singing_classes WHERE class_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY class_id DESC;
SELECT class_id, class_time FROM singing_classes WHERE class_date >= '2022-03-01' AND class_location = 'Studio B' ORDER BY class_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM singing_classes;
SELECT class_date, class_time FROM singing_classes;
SELECT * FROM enrolled_students WHERE student_name = 'Alice';
SELECT class_id, location FROM singing_classes ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT student_name FROM enrolled_students WHERE class_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM singing_classes ORDER BY class_date DESC, class_time ASC
SELECT student_name, class_date, class_time FROM enrolled_students INNER JOIN singing_classes ON enrolled_students.class_id = singing_classes.class_id WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT location FROM singing_classes WHERE class_date >= '2022-01-01' AND class_date <= '2022-12-31'

SELECT student_name, class_date, class_time, location FROM enrolled_students INNER JOIN singing_classes ON enrolled_students.class_id = singing_classes.class_id ORDER BY class_date ASC, class_time DESC
SELECT class_id, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM enrolled_students GROUP BY class_id HAVING total_students > 5
SELECT * FROM singing_classes;
SELECT class_date, class_time FROM singing_classes ORDER BY class_date DESC, class_time ASC;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email FROM instructors WHERE instructor_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT student_name, student_phone FROM students ORDER BY student_name LIMIT 5;
SELECT class_date, location FROM singing_classes WHERE location='Studio A';
SELECT * FROM singing_classes WHERE class_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email FROM instructors WHERE instructor_id = 'aa11bb22-33cc-44dd-55ee-66ff';
SELECT student_name, student_email, student_phone FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT class_date, class_time, location FROM singing_classes WHERE class_date >= '2022-09-01' ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT instructor_name FROM instructors WHERE instructor_id IN ('11aa22bb-33cc-44dd-55ee-66ff', '22aa33bb-44cc-55dd-66ee-77ff') ORDER BY instructor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM singing_classes ORDER BY class_date ASC, class_time DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM singing_classes WHERE location = 'Studio A';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT attendance_date FROM attendance WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_date FROM singing_classes WHERE class_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM singing_classes JOIN attendance ON singing_classes.class_id = attendance.class_id GROUP BY class_id;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM locations WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM singing_classes;
SELECT class_name, class_date, location FROM singing_classes ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT class_id, teacher_id, schedule_date, schedule_time FROM class_schedule WHERE schedule_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT class_name, class_date, class_time, location FROM singing_classes WHERE class_time BETWEEN '10:00:00' AND '12:00:00'
SELECT * FROM singing_classes;
SELECT class_name, location FROM singing_classes WHERE class_date = '2022-03-10';
SELECT students.student_name, class_attendance.attendance_status FROM students INNER JOIN class_attendance ON students.student_id = class_attendance.student_id;

SELECT class_name, teacher_name, schedule_date, schedule_time FROM singing_classes JOIN class_schedule ON singing_classes.class_id = class_schedule.class_id JOIN teachers ON class_schedule.teacher_id = teachers.teacher_id;
SELECT class_name, COUNT(*) AS number_of_students_attending FROM singing_classes JOIN class_attendance ON singing_classes.class_id = class_attendance.class_id GROUP BY class_name;
